title: [Large-Scale] Analysis of Factors Influencing Online Learning Outcomes: Meta-Analysis-Based Practitioner Guide

context.prior_knowledge: Online Learning Experience and Basic Conceptual Understanding of Statistical Analysis
context.additional_context: Designed for practical application of online learning effectiveness factors validated across regions during the global pandemic. Provides content optimized for smartphone-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain nine core variables influencing online learning outcomes using meta-analysis methodology
Learners can compare online learning cases across regions (US, Asia, Europe) and establish learning strategies tailored to organizational characteristics
Learners can provide practical guidelines for effective online learning design in resource-constrained technical environments (smartphone-centric)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
